meanings.definition: The quality or state of being superb.
meanings.sent1: Her superbness in painting was evident in every stroke.
meanings.sent2: The superbness of the view from the mountaintop took my breath away.
meanings.sent3: The cat's superbness in catching mice made him the hero of the house.
meanings.sent4: The superbness of the orchestra's performance transported the audience to another world.
meanings.sent5: The superbness of her singing voice resonated throughout the auditorium.

meanings.definition: The state or quality of being excellent or magnificent.
meanings.sent1: The superbness of the cake made it the star of the party.
meanings.sent2: His superbness in sports earned him a gold medal.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's superbness in saving the city made him a legend.
meanings.sent4: The superbness of the sunrise painted the sky in hues of pink and orange.
meanings.sent5: The superbness of the diamond's sparkle caught everyone's eye.
